sentences.english: It’s easy to get caught up in the mile-long to-do list of preparations.
sentences.chinese: 你很容易被冗长的筹备清单搞得焦头烂额。

sentences.english: "Let us now is about to publish the muttering about the new" law of post.
sentences.chinese: 现在让我们焦头烂额的是即将出台的新《邮政法》。

sentences.english: I will surely be bonded by those worldly affairs, which might make me tired and in bad shape.
sentences.chinese: 这些俗事必定把我的时间绑死，令我累的焦头烂额。

sentences.english: This series of major, let nakamura and Mr Busy.
sentences.chinese: 这一系列的大案，让中村和福田忙的焦头烂额。
